item.description:
EVENT UPDATE

We have people from different groups going, and it should be a great event! There are poker tables in the back, and plenty of places in walking distance to grab a bite to eat. World Championship Billiards is on Spencer Street in Manchester, just over the East Hartford town line (Silver Lane) and near Shop Rite Plaza, Friendly's, Starbucks -in the Dunkin' Donuts plaza -you can't miss it!. If you have any trouble finding us, call us at (860) 236-3343

See You There!

CENTRAL CT SINGLES HAS INVITED US:

Central CT Singles Pool Night At World Championship Billiards

171-G Spencer Street (Across from Dunkin Donuts)
Manchester, CT 06040 (860) 647-1711

Please RSVP on Central CT Singles Click Here

Join Us For A Fun Night Of Pool With Central CT Singles At World Championship Billiards

Friday November 30 at 8pm

FREE POOL All Night (Regular Price is $7.50 per hour)

Drink Specials - All Beer and Wine Only $3.25

Open Jukebox All Night

FREE Pool Lessons For Beginners


Beat the Owner And Win A $150 Pool Cue!

Have Fun And Meet Local Singles

Tickets 15 in online or at the Event

RSVP Today

-for more details call (860) 236-3343

Or Visit www.CentralCTSingles.com

group.name: Entertainment CT .com VIP Club Music Theatre Golf Friends
